job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} echo $INPUTFILE0 | grep ':' if (! $?) then set evtsFile = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $1}'` set file = `basename $evtsFile .daq` set f = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $2}'` set l = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $3}'` set fileL = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $4}'` set runG = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $5}'` else set evtsFile = $INPUTFILE0; set file = `basename $evtsFile .daq` set f = 1 set l = 50000 set fileL = ${file}_${f}_${l} set runG = 1 endif echo "${evtsFile}" set filel = ${file}_${f}_${l} set output = ${filel}.event.root set ddir = ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY}; echo "${evtsFile}" if (! -r ${evtsFile}) exit 1; set logFile = ${filel}B.log if ( -r $logFile) exit 0; set muFile = ${filel}.MuDst.root if (-r $muFile) exit 0; set fitter = "KFVertex" set case = `basename $ddir`; echo "case = $case"; echo $case | grep PPV if (! $?) set fitter = ""; # echo $case | grep 2D # if (! $?) set fitter = ${fitter}",TpxClu2D" echo "fitter $fitter" echo $case | grep pileup if ($?) then echo "No pileup" root4star -q -b 'bfcMixer_Pythia.C('${f}','${l}',"'${fitter}'","'${evtsFile}'","'$output'",'${runG}',"y2012b")' >& ${logFile} else echo "With pileup" root4star -q -b 'bfcMixer_Pythia_pileup.C('${f}','${l}',"'${fitter}'","'${evtsFile}'","'$output'",'${runG}',"y2012b")' >& ${logFile} endif
